class_description: A source app uses an object that conforms to this protocol to initialize an item provider for a copied or dragged item.

params.param_description: The uniform type identifier (UTI) identifying the type of data to load.
The handler that's called after the data is loaded.

return_description: The progress of the data load process.

Methods.method_description: Loads data of a particular type, identified by the given UTI.Required.
Methods.method_declar: func loadData(withTypeIdentifier typeIdentifier: String, forItemProviderCompletionHandler completionHandler: @escaping (Data?, Error?) -> Void) -> Progress?

return_description: A representation visibility specification for the given UTI.

Methods.method_description: Asks the item provider for the default representation visibility specification for the given UTI.
Methods.method_declar: optional static func itemProviderVisibilityForRepresentation(withTypeIdentifier typeIdentifier: String) -> NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility

return_description: A representation visibility specification for the given UTI.

Methods.method_description: Asks the item provider for the representation visibility specification for the given UTI.

Vars.var_description: An array of UTI strings representing the types of data that can be loaded for an item provider.Required.
An array of UTI strings representing the types of data that can be loaded for an item provider.
